title: A Golden Age for U.S. Oil Refiners
description:
The key to profits in the gasoline business is natural gas, not just crude. BofA's Doug Leggate explains. And Denton Cinquegrana at OPIS talks summer pump prices.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
